mapper.insert: INSERT into course (name, num, college_id, intro) VALUES (#{name}, #{num}, #{collegeId}, #{intro})
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.num, c.name AS collegeName, u.intro FROM course AS u JOIN college AS c ON u.college_id = c.id
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.num, c.name AS collegeName, u.intro FROM course AS u JOIN college AS c ON u.college_id = c.id and u.id in ( SELECT c_id FROM collect ct WHERE ct.stu_id =#{sId} )
mapper.delete: UPDATE course SET name = #{name}, num = #{num}, college_id = #{collegeId}, intro = #{intro} WHERE id = #{id}
